headline: Why Applied Materials (AMAT) Deserves a Spot Among Cheap Dividend Stocks
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is included among the 13 Incredibly Cheap Dividend Stocks to Invest in. Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) supplies equipment, software, and services that help manufacturers produce semiconductors and display panels. Its core offerings include systems for wafer fabrication, tools for display production, and a wide range of engineering support. Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT)’s […]
